description: This is a Python source file defining functions for managing environment variable mappings for different frameworks based on YAML templates. The functions include retrieving template paths, parsing templates, mapping environment variables between common and framework-specific formats, and listing supported frameworks.

methods.name: Path get_template_path(framework: str)
methods.description: Constructs the path to the environment template file for a specified framework.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Dict[str,str]] parse_template_file(template_path: Path)
methods.description: Parses a YAML template file to extract an optional prefix and a mapping dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str)
methods.description: Applies a prefix to all environment variables in a given dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Converts common environment variables into framework-specific variables based on the template.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Converts framework-specific environment variables back into the common format.

methods.name: list get_supported_frameworks()
methods.description: Lists all frameworks supported based on directory structure and presence of template files.

ctags.name: apply_prefix_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_common_to_framework
ctags.pattern: /^def map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_framework_to_common
ctags.pattern: /^def map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
